entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TableView cells disappear when cells are updated on Android #16533
  • ListView not change BackgroundColor when Theme is changed on iOS #16531
  • MAUI will not launch #16526
  • WebView with an attached CookieContainer not storing cookies on IOS device #16525
  • How to interact with non lifecycle events in MainActivity #16524
  • [Android] Error compiling in release mode #16523
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #16522
  • [Windows] ListView inside Detail from FlyoutPage not rendering #16521
  • [Windows] Crash navigating using NavigationPage #16520
  • REOPEN [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #16519
  • [Android] Content is removed from page before animation during back navigation, when using NavigationPage #16518
  • Cannot register an Effect when using the templated PlatformEffect #16517
  • Unable to load the package dependencies in Xamarin forms and MAUI #16515
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] [Android] BitmapFactory.DecodeStreamAsync crashes the app on .NET 8-preview.6 in Release mode #16514
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Android: AppShell prevents gestures on native control #6553
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Grid with a star and an empty auto column leads to an incorrect layout #16334
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Incorrect layout when using a Grid with Star and Auto Columns with a child with HeightRequest placed in the Auto column #16368
    .NET 8 GA
  • Scaling of root VisualElement is ignored #15672
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] CollectionView doesn't automatically expand anymore #15697
    .NET 8 GA
  • about support linux #16529
  • Touchscreen not working after rapidly clicking while app startup #16251
  • MAUI: Xamarin.Android.Aapt2.targets(156,3): error : The file exists #16513
  • The CollectionView does not fit the item height on Windows. But is ok to Android. #16358
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / Maui 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 AvoidConstArraysAnalyzer NullReferenceException #15948
  • Padding: Error Cannot convert value "10 12" to "Microsoft.Maui.Thickness" #15852
  • [Windows, Blazor] Review currently failing Windows tests #16187
    8.0-rc2
  • Window glitches when dragging app between monitors with different scaling #11777
    .NET 8 GA
  • LineHeight, CharacterSpacing, TextDecorations property not working when Label is first displayed on iOS. #16204
    Under Consideration
  • iOS Debugger Indicates App Has Terminated Immediately #9056
    .NET 8 GA
  • Maui TabbedPage breaks in windows when navigating #12065
    Backlog
  • Flex Layout -> BindableLayout not working after ItemsSource changed in new vs preview version #9544
  • CollectionView not showing correctly inside AbsoluteLayout in iOS #15808
  • Button.LineBreakMode does not work on Windows #15828
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui 7 app crashes on iOS 17 #16316
  • Requesting permissions to access nearby WiFi devices on Android 13+ #13721
    Under Consideration
  • Hot-Reload Not Detecting XAML Changes #16267

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow "duplicate" files to be processed #16534
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SwipeView #16532
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • Add property for tapping on page #16530
  • [uitests] Add UITests for RefreshView #16528
    area/testing
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 branch #16527
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Allow * rows/columns treated as Auto to expand during 2nd measure pass #16488
    area/layout 🔲, backport/suggested
  • [build] allow main to be built with a .NET 8 SDK #16508
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16489
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix BlazorWebView tests on Windows #16487
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [testing] Make test by default on 16.4 #16479
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #16473
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 8.0-preview7
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] Fix EntryCellRenderer to use FromHandler for text changes #16462
  • [uitests] Skip a couple of more Compatibility UITests #16477
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Add <inheritdoc /> XML docs for explicit interface implementations in BlazorWebView #16535
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️, t/docs 📝
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8
  • Add `dotnet-local` scripts to make using in tree dotnet easier. #16461
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
    area/dispatching
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16474
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Locate MAUI View for PlatformView #16463
    area/architecture
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Adds a null check to avoid crashing SearchHandler #16308
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] fix Specificity for VSM #16404
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
